title: remake_0.7beta.7z
description:
A new Patch for PES 2008. ItÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s the PES 2008 Remake v0.7 beta Patch made by ravenger.
Features :

- Bundesliga replaced the Dutch Eredivisie
- Eredivisie on others C
- New clubs: Steaua, Shakhtar, CSKA Moskva, Zenit, Dnipro
- All national teams and clubs have real player names
- All real transfers
- All cups, clubs have the correct names
- Real Stadiums Pictures and Names
- All National team kits, numbers and fonts
- All EPL kits, numbers and fonts
- Kits and fonts for Bundesliga and Serie A
- New grass texture for all stadiums
- New start formations of some large teams
- New clubs and national teams emblems
- SkySports logo on replay, statistics screen and highlights
- PS3 gamepad
- Scoreboards and menu in a League Champions style
- New gloves
- New boots pack
- New ball pack
- New adboards for all stadiums
- Correct collars, numbers position, names curve
- New corner flag
